967300.name: TS Marketplace: Northeast Corridor Scenario Pack 01 Add-On
967300.description:
Experience ultra-action-packed and authentic railroading on America’s famous Northeast Corridor!

Train Simulator’s classic Northeast Corridor: New York – Philadelphia Route re-creates the busiest section of the legendary “NEC,” and now High Iron Simulations’ Northeast Corridor Scenario Pack 01 brings the route to full vigor and bustling life!

In the ten realistic career scenarios of Northeast Corridor Scenario Pack 01 you’ll experience the ultimate in Corridor diversity, hustle, and bustle as you take the controls of seven types of Amtrak and NJ Transit passenger and commuter equipment, including:

  • Amtrak’s high-speed Acela
  • Amtrak’s ultra-modern ACS-64 electric
  • Amtrak’s venerable AEM-7 electric
  • NJ Transit’s ALP-46 electric
  • NJ Transit ALP-45DP dual-mode locomotive
  • NJ Transit’s veteran Arrow EMU
  • NJ Transit’s “push- pull” Bi-Level Cab Car

In Northeast Corridor Scenario Pack 01, you’ll climb aboard at the NEC’s classic locations – New York Penn Station and Philadelphia’s 30th Street Station – and work trains originating or terminating at intermediate locations such as NJ Transit’s Jersey Avenue station and Trenton Transportation Center. And you’ll test your skills as an engineer handling the challenges of everything from high-speed Acela express runs to “all stops” NJT locals!

Northeast Corridor Scenario Pack 01’s ten realistic career scenarios, created by noted scenario author Gary Dolzall, are closely based upon actual Amtrak and NJ Transit operations.

Note: This pack requires the Train Simulator Northeast Corridor: New York – Philadelphia Route Add-On; North Jersey Coast Line Route Add-On; NEC: New York - New Haven Route Add-On; NJ Transit ALP-46 Loco Add-On; Amtrak Acela Express EMU Add-On; and NJ Transit Arrow III EMU Add-On. All required products are available at the Steam Store.

The legendary Northeast Corridor is one of America’s ultimate railroading experiences – and you can now experience the Corridor at its busy, diverse, and challenging best in Northeast Corridor Scenario Pack 01!

Included Scenarios


  • [NEC 1.01] Amtrak Acela 2103
  • [NEC 1.02] NJ Transit Express 3947
  • [NEC 1.03] Northeast Regional 148, Part 1
  • [NEC 1.04] Northeast Regional 148, Part 2
  • [NEC 1.05] NJT 7821, Trenton Local
  • [NEC 1.06] NJT Manhattan Express
  • [NEC 1.07] Jersey Avenue Arrow
  • [NEC 1.08] Amtrak’s War Horse
  • [NEC 1.09] Local to Jersey Avenue
  • [NEC 1.10] Acela Nor’easter
